name: AVIAIR AVIATION SCHOOL INC.
about: AVIAIR AVIATION SCHOOL INC. is a licensed pilot training school based in the Philippines, dedicated to providing top-of-the-line education to prepare students for careers in airline and corporate aviation. Led by Capt. Antonio Halagueña, a retired airline chief pilot with over 36 years of experience, the school is supported by a faculty of experienced pilots and professional staff. Aviair focuses on world-class pilot training, emphasizing safety procedures, and adheres to global aviation standards with well-maintained aircraft and equipment. The school operates from its ground school campus in Parañaque City and conducts flight training at Plaridel Airport, offering courses such as Private Pilot License, Commercial Pilot License, and Instrument Rating. With a strong safety culture and no accidents recorded for five consecutive years, Aviair aims to produce highly-trained, professional pilots ready for rewarding careers in the aviation industry.
